meanings.sent1: The biannual school fair is always a fun event for the students.
meanings.sent2: The company holds biannual meetings to discuss their progress.
meanings.sent3: I look forward to the biannual bake sale because I love buying cookies.
meanings.sent4: The biannual migration of birds is a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The biannual fireworks show lights up the sky with colorful explosions.

meanings.definition: Lasting for or relating to two years.
meanings.sent1: The biannual project required careful planning over two years.
meanings.sent2: The biannual report summarized the company's performance over the past two years.
meanings.sent3: The biannual subscription to the magazine saved me money in the long run.
meanings.sent4: The biannual renovation of the building kept it looking fresh and new.
meanings.sent5: The biannual event brought together participants from across the country every two years.
